column1: It is  noted  that in  the  evidence  in chief of PW2  he  has
stated that he  saw  the  incident  with  the  help  of moonlight,
but when cross examined, without any hesitation has stated

that  there  was  electric 
light  as  well  as  moonlight,  which

enabled  him 
to  witness 
the 
incident.  PWI  has  evidenced

that  he  identified  the  appellant  from  the  light 
that  came
from  Nima/'s house, he has not mentioned any moon light.
